thread.title: Taniqua Johnson-Pino

author: Taniqua Johnson-Pino
title: Taniqua Johnson-Pino
text: We LOVED our trial meal. We got a groupon for $25 for 4 meals, we would spend that, probably not the $60 retail =) BUT, this was not just great food, it was sooo fun. I was not expecting the cute apron, what a fun surprise! We have fish in orange sauce over couscous. AWESOME!! Love the recipe, not something I would have thought of. Introduced us to a new spice. The "chef tip" is great too. Outside of price we loved every single thing about this. We also got pepper steak, it was a gorgeous cut of meat and we are snobby about our beef, beautiful marbling. If the price fits your budget, this is fun, quick and oh so tasty! Great job guys!
